TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 將某個類別指定為與資料庫資料表相關聯的實體類別。

span.span: Designates a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用這個屬性可以指定某個類別，做為與資料庫資料表或檢視相關聯的實體類別。Use this attribute to designate a class as an entity class that is associated with a database table or view. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 會將具有的類別視為持續性類別的屬性。 treats classes that have the attribute as persistent classes. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 支援只有單一資料表對應。 supports only single-table mapping. 也就是實體類別必須對應至一個資料庫資料表，並不能在同一時間將資料庫資料表對應到多個類別。That is, an entity class must be mapped to exactly one database table, and you cannot map a database table to multiple classes at the same time. 您可以使用屬性屬性，指定資料表的名稱和您選擇可以使用結構描述名稱來限定資料表名稱。You can use the property of the attribute to specify a name for the table, and you can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 如果您未指定名稱使用資料表名稱會假設屬性，做為類別名稱相同。If you do not specify a name by using the property, the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. ## 結構描述限定名稱Schema-qualified Names 您選擇可以使用結構描述名稱來限定資料表名稱。You can optionally use the schema name to qualify a table name. 根據預設，左邊的第一個週期中的語彙基元字串會被視為結構描述名稱。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name. 名稱的其餘部分會被視為資料表名稱。The remainder of the name is considered to be the table name. 提供者會引用資料表名稱。The provider quotes the table name as appropriate. 比方說，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]適用於 SQL Server 的提供者可確保，方括號會使用至少需要的地方。For example, the [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] provider for SQL Server makes sure that brackets are used at least where they are needed. > [!NOTE] > 在某些情況下，您必須明確地加上引號的屬性因為 SQL Server 提供者無法自動加上引號。In some cases, you must explicitly quote attributes because the SQL Server provider cannot auto-quote. 下表顯示一些範例。The following table shows some examples. |案例Case|範例： 識別項名稱Example: Identifier Name|屬性中的範例： 必須是的字串Example: Expected String in Attributes|否則...Otherwise…| |----------|------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|----------------| |結構描述名稱包含句點Schema name contains a period|結構描述:"A.B"Schema: "A.B"

資料表:"C"Table: "C"|"[A.B]。C""[A.B].C"|第一期的假設是分開的資料表名稱的結構描述名稱。The first period is assumed to separate the schema name from the table name.| |結構描述/資料表名稱開頭為 `@`Schema/Table name starts with `@`|"@SomeName""@SomeName"|"[@SomeName]""[@SomeName]"|假設參數名稱。Assumed to be a parameter name.| |結構描述具有`[`，並結束 `]`Schema starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[Schema.Table]""[Schema.Table]"|"[[Schema]。[Table]]]""[[Schema].[Table]]]"|不具引號的識別項類似於加上引號的識別碼。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| |表格最開始`[`，並結束 `]`Table starts with `[` and ends with `]`|"[Table]""[Table]"|"[[Table]]]""[[Table]]]"|不具引號的識別項類似於加上引號的識別碼。The unquoted identifier resembles a quoted identifier.| ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定資料表或檢視的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the table or view.

value.span: 根據預設，這個值與類別名稱相同。

span.span: By default, the value is the same as the name of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未指定名稱使用，資料表名稱會假設為類別名稱相同。If you do not specify a name by using , the table name is assumed to be the same as the class name. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇使用結構描述名稱，來限定資料表名稱 (例如 Schema3.Table5)。You can optionally use a schema name to qualify the table name (for example, Schema3.Table5). 根據預設，左邊的第一個週期中的語彙基元字串個數字會被視為結構描述名稱，而其他資料表的名稱。By default, the token to the left of the first period in the string is considered to be the schema name, and the rest to be the table name. 在下列範例中，預設資料表名稱`Customer`，變更為`Customers`。In the following example, the default table name, `Customer`, is changed to `Customers`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DLinqCustomize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCustomize/vb/Module1.vb#1)]
